title: Police: Shooting outside party in Albion leaves 4 hurt
content:
Albion — Police say a shooting outside a party in southern Michigan left four people wounded.
Police say someone in a vehicle opened fire on the group late Thursday in Albion. The wounded were taken from the scene for treatment of injuries that were described by authorities as non-life-threatening.
WWMT-TV reports police say the shooting may have been related to an earlier altercation, but the circumstances are under investigation.
WOOD-TV says police are searching for a suspect.
